Key Match Events: David Miller hits two sixes in a row in Ashwin's spell.
Hardik Pandya bags his first wicket.
Ashwin takes 17 runs off his over.
Miller smashes a long sixer to Ashwin.
Virat Kohli drops Markram's catch in Ashwin's over.
SuryaKumar hits back-to-back boundaries, wins hearts with stupendous form.
SuryaKumar dominates the pitch as he hits another boundary.
Arshdeep Singh strikes again. Takes second wicket in his first over.
Arshdeep takes wicket on first ball of his first over.
Ashwin scored 7 runs before getting eliminated with a catch
Pre-Game Insights: India won the toss and chose to bat first.
India is in a strong position as they have won 2 matches in 2 games.
India will score a hat-trick if it wins today’s match against South Africa.
The game is going to be crucial for both India and South Africa as this match’s result will impact both teams’ fate in Group 2 as well.
Post-Match Reflections: Spectacular performances by David Miller and Aiden Markram take South Africa up on the point chart by defeating India.
South Africa defeat India by 5 wickets
South Africa beat India by 5 wickets
